page.title: 10Entertainment and Clubs
page.content:
There are a great variety of lesiure activities in{ Yaxley}e.g. There are { {Yaxley}Amature Players for both adults and children which put on producions a couple of times a year .
For those interested in sport there are football,cricket, bowls, table tennis and angling clubs.
There are also groups for aerobics,bellringers,cage birds, young wives,mothers union,mens fellowship. There are groups attached to the various churches e.g. Kiro and Methodist.
For chidren there are pree school playgroups(mothers & toddlers) youth clubs,cubs or scouts or boys brigade.
